title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\Agent
name: Agent
description: This class is responsible for registering all debugger breakpoints and logpoints for each request. It should be created as early as possible in your application.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Create a new Debugger Agent, registers all breakpoints for collection or execution, and registers a shutdown function for reporting results.

params.name: options.storage
params.description: Breakpoint storage to fetch breakpoints from. Defaults to a new SysvBreakpointStorage instance.

params.name: options.debuggee
params.description: Unique debuggee instance. Defaults to a generated debuggee instance.

params.name: options.sourceRoot
params.description: Path to the root of the source repository. Defaults to the directory of the calling file.

params.name: options.logger
params.description: PSR-3 compliant logger used to write logpoint records. Defaults to a new Stackdriver logger.

methods.name: flush
methods.description:
Flushes items in the batch queue that have yet to be delivered. Please note this will have no effect when using the batch daemon.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Core\Batch\BatchTrait
